root.message: The SDG_TARGET field for indicator 8-5-2, translated into all languages

languages.language: 8.5 By 2030, achieve full and productive employment and decent work for all women and men, including young people and people with disabilities, and equal pay for work of equal value

8.5 Até 2030, alcançar o emprego pleno e produtivo e trabalho decente todas as mulheres e homens, inclusive para os jovens e as pessoas com deficiência, e remuneração igual para trabalho de igual valor
